sentences.en: Guar gum can viscosify, stabilize, and emulsify water systems as well as bind moisture to itself.
sentences.cn: 瓜尔胶可增粘 、 稳定 、 乳化水体系并能够自身结合水分.

sentences.en: Instead of traditional solid particles in PIV, emulsify ied air bubbles are used as PIV particles.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍一种适用于水洞力学实验的采用乳化空气泡做为示踪粒子的PIV测速技术.

sentences.en: It is the pressure which releases the coffee oils; these emulsify and give the coffee its rich, velvety texture.
sentences.cn: 压力将咖啡的油脂挤出，这些油脂经乳化带给咖啡一种浓郁、柔滑的口感。

sentences.en: Most of them can be used as emulsification due to their good emulsify character.
sentences.cn: 指出大部分大豆磷脂都具有良好的乳化性质,可用做化妆品的乳化剂.

sentences.en: Results: It was found that basic ionic water acted to emulsify cholesterol and triglycerides clearly.
sentences.cn: 结果: 碱性离子水可明显地乳化胆固醇和三油酸甘油酯的作用.

sentences.en: Whisk the cream into the mixture to emulsify it.
sentences.cn: 将奶油搅打到混合物中，使其乳化。

trans.tran_en: to combine to become a smooth mixture, or to make two liquids do this
